name: A Light In The Dark (itch) (Shesh Gaur, Christian Moncada)
name_original: A Light In The Dark (itch) (Shesh Gaur, Christian Moncada)
description:
A Game By Shesh Gaur, Christian Moncada, & Stephen Chin

Awaken in a neon underwater mountain range. Herd fish using your trusty attract/repel light to safety.
